title: 87/200/EEC: Commission Decision of 10 March 1987 amending Decision 84/248/EEC authorizing the Federal Republic of Germany to adopt, when introducing into its territory plants or plant products, special plant health provisions laid down for home-grown production of certain fruit plants intended for planting (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 10 March 1987
amending Decision 84/248/EEC authorizing the Federal Republic of Germany to adopt, when introducing into its territory plants or plant products, special plant health provisions laid down for home-grown production of certain fruit plants intended for planting
(Only the German text is authentic)
(87/200/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 2 of Decision 84/248/EEC, '31 December 1986' is hereby replaced by '31 December 1988'.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 March 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
